Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.controller.computer_strategies

Class AIStrategy

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.controller.computer_strategies.AIStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComputerStrategy
public class AIStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComputerStrategy
Strategy class for the AI player. A game tree is created. The tree is searched with a Monte Carlo method. Source: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach. Russell, Norvig 2020.

will be used in a future update
